titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in the
Special Collections Research Center UA 341
titlepage.publisher: Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: This collections contains programs, fliers, and reports from the Department of Kinesiology at the College of William and Mary. Included in the collection are programs and fliers for the student dance group, Orchesis.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: College of William and Mary, Department of Kinesiology Records, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: This collection was previously part of the Department of Physical Education Records (UA 198) and the University Archives Publications Collection.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: A box and folder list was created by Patricia Sanabria, SCRC Staff, in August 2009.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Department of Kinesiology was created in 1992 out of the previous Department of Physical Education. Kinesiology, the study of human movement, prepares students for a wide variety of academic and professional pursuits. Students may choose to receive a Bachelor of Science (B.S.) degree or a Bachelor of Arts (B.A.) degree when completing the kinesiology major at William and Mary. Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Dept. of Kinesiology.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collections contains programs, fliers, and reports from the Department of Kinesiology at the College of William and Mary. Included in the collection are programs and fliers for the student dance group, Orchesis.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Materials
separatedmaterial.p: The Department of Kinesiology Assessment Report from 1993 was separated from Acc. 2009.019 of the Department of Physical Education and transferred to this collection on 2/4/2009.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
